EmailTemplate.name: Deal Registration Finance submission Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Deal Registration: Request for approval.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Deal_Registration__c.Finance_Next_Approver__c},
The NCR Interact Deal Registration Program has received a submission from {!Deal_Registration__c.Partner_Company_Name__c}
Details :
Channel Partner Company Name: {!Deal_Registration__c.Partner_Company_Name__c} Name of Account/Financial Institution: {!Deal_Registration__c.End_Customer_Company_Name__c} Projected Opportunity Value: {!Deal_Registration__c.Projected_Opportunity_Value__c}
Your approval or rejection is required before this Deal Registration can be moved into an Opportunity within Salesforce.
If this submission changes, is canceled, or you have any question regarding this submission, please contact the NCR Interact team at team.channels@ncr.com or interact.operations@ncr.com.
Regards,
NCR Interact Partner Program Team
NCR Confidential. FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY
